channel.title: New sub forum for press/reviews?
channel.description:
Just an idea.
Would it be a good idea to have a sub forum or stickied thread to collect all the various press about BM that are popping up? I find it really interesting considering the time the mod/game has taken and its interesting to see the world explode !
I think it would be a good idea, like a database of links/reviews/videos. Suppose i'm kinda proud of the dev's and like to see how places are reacting now BM is actually with us. I hope to hear/see from Valve at some time, i'd love to hear their view on BM.. I hope they were as impressed as most of us were and its maybe inspired some people to get together and think about HL3 :wink:
Cheers David
